member.name: T:Waher.Things.SensorData.DurationField
member.summary:
Represents a duration value. Duration values adhere to the type specified by xsd:duration.
Difference between xsd:time and xsd:duration is that: xsd:duration represents the relative span between twostamps in time. xsd:time represents an absolute time or clock in the 24-hour clock.

member.name: T:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS
member.summary: Field Quality of Service flags

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.Missing
member.summary: Value is missing

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.InProgress
member.summary: Value is in progress to be measured or calculated. The value is to be considered as unsure and not final. Read again later to retrieve the correct value. It is more reliable than a missing value, but less reliable than an estimate.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.AutomaticEstimate
member.summary: An estimate of the value has been done automatically. Considered more reliable than a value in progress.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.ManualEstimate
member.summary: The value has manually been estimated. Considered more reliable than an automatic estimate.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.ManualReadout
member.summary: Value has been manually read. Considered more reliable than a manual estimate.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.AutomaticReadout
member.summary: Value has been automatically read. Considered more reliable than a manually read value.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.TimeOffset
member.summary: The time was offset more than allowed and corrected during the measurement period.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.Warning
member.summary: A warning was logged during the measurement period.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.Error
member.summary: An error was logged during the measurement period.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.Signed
member.summary: The value has been signed by an operator. Considered more reliable than an automatically read value. Note that the signed quality of service flag can be used to overwrite existing values of higher importance. Example signed + invoiced can be considered more reliable than only invoiced, etc.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.Invoiced
member.summary: The value has been invoiced by an operator. Considered more reliable than a signed value.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.EndOfSeries
member.summary: The value has been marked as an end point in a series. This can be used for instance to mark the change of tenant in an apartment.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.PowerFailure
member.summary: The device recorded a power failure during the measurement period.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldQoS.InvoiceConfirmed
member.summary: The value has been invoiced by an operator and confirmed by the recipient. Considered more reliable than an invoiced value.

member.name: T:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType
member.summary: Field Type flags

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Momentary
member.summary: A momentary value represents a value measured at the time of the read-out. Examples: Energy, Volume, Power, Flow, Temperature, Pressure, etc.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Identity
member.summary: A value that can be used for identification. (Serial numbers, meter IDs, locations, names, addresses, etc.)

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Status
member.summary: A value displaying status information about something. Examples: Health, Battery life time, Runtime, Expected life time, Signal strength, Signal quality, etc.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Computed
member.summary: A value that is computed instead of measured.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Peak
member.summary: A maximum or minimum value during a given period. Examples "Temperature, Max", "Temperature, Min", etc.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.Historical
member.summary: A historical value.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.AllExceptHistorical
member.summary: All types, except historical values.

member.name: F:Waher.Things.SensorData.FieldType.All
member.summary: All field types.

member.name: T:Waher.Things.SensorData.TimeField
member.summary:
Represents a time value. Time values adhere to the type specified by xsd:time.
Difference between xsd:time and xsd:duration is that: xsd:duration represents the relative span between twostamps in time. xsd:time represents an absolute time or clock in the 24-hour clock.
